item.title: 埃塞俄比亚亏损导致 Safaricom 年度利润低于预期
item.description: Safaricom Group Plc 公布的年度利润低于预期，原因是这家肯尼亚电信巨头在邻国埃塞俄比亚的业务部门在其运营的第一个完整年度出现了亏损。【原文：Safaricom Group Plc reported lower than expected annual profit as the Kenyan telecommunications giant’s unit in neighboring Ethiopia booked losses in its first full year of operations.】

item.title: 连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜交易首日上涨 11
item.description: 高端连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜首次公开发行股票，涨幅高达 11%。【原文：High-end supermarket chain Spinneys rose as much as 11% in its Dubai trading debut after a rare private sector initial public offering in the United Arab Emirates, an encouraging sign for other companies looking to go public.】

item.title: 首尔将于下周公布房地产债务措施
item.description: 韩国金融监督机构负责人表示，韩国计划下周宣布针对问题项目融资债务的措施，以缓解银行和房地产企业的压力。【原文：South Korea plans to announce measures for troubled project-finance debt next week in an effort to ease the stress in banking and real-estate businesses, according to the nation’s financial watchdog chief.】

item.title: 英国央行决议和新闻发布会：今日市场特刊
item.description: 通勤者经过伦敦金融城的英格兰银行（BOE）。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters pass the Bank of England (BOE) in the City of London. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 外币紧缩缓解，埃及通胀持续放缓
item.description: 埃及的通货膨胀率在 4 月份连续第二个月放缓，因为在最近的货币浮动之后，外汇供应量的增加似乎缓解了中东人口最多国家的一些物价压力。【原文：Egyptian inflation slowed in April for a second month, as greater availability of foreign exchange after a recent currency flotation appeared to ease some price pressures for the Middle East’s largest population.】

item.title: 印度航空快运公司员工因合并起义，旅行混乱加剧
item.description: 印度航空有限公司（Air India Ltd. ）旗下的廉价航空公司在机舱乘务员集体请病假后，又取消了二十多个航班，并预计航班中断将持续数天。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s low-cost airline has canceled more than two dozen additional flights, and expects disruptions to continue for days, after cabin crew called in sick en masse.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: KKR 支持的修船公司将利用首次公开募股募集资金促进增长
item.description: 在完成韩国两年来最大的首次公开募股仅一天后，KKR & Co.支持的航运维修公司HD Hyundai Marine Solution Co.透露了其下一个目标— 未来三年年收入增长25%，并增加投资以解决海上排放问题。【原文：Only a day after completing South Korea’s biggest initial public offering in two years, KKR & Co.-backed shipping repair company HD Hyundai Marine Solution Co. has revealed its next goals — 25% growth in annual revenue for the next three years and increased investments to tackle maritime emissions.】

item.title: 沙特证券交易所首席执行官预计 IPO 将进一步激增
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯有十多家公司等待在其证券交易所进行首次公开募股，同时有多达 50 多家公司申请上市，这表明沙特王国的首次公开募股活动热潮将持续下去。【原文：Saudi Arabia has more than ten companies waiting to pursue initial public offerings on its stock exchange, while upwards of 50 firms have applied for listings, in a sign that the frenzy of IPO activity in the kingdom is set to continue.】

item.title: 上田岸田会谈助推日本央行快速行动，提高收益率
item.description: 日本首相和央行行长之间的会晤助长了人们的猜测，他们正在厘清政策变化，债券收益率也因此有望突破关键水平。【原文：Meetings between Japan’s prime minister and central bank governor are fueling speculation they’re ironing out policy changes, and bond yields look headed above a key level as a result.】

item.title: 墨西哥考虑吸收 Pemex 400 亿美元债务的方案
item.description: 墨西哥一位高级财政官员在纽约告诉投资者，墨西哥正在研究各种方案，以消化 Pemex 公司高达 400 亿美元的债务，这相当于下一届总统任期内即将到期的债务。【原文：Mexico is studying options to absorb as much as $40 billion in Pemex debt, the equivalent of what will come due in the next presidential term, one of its top finance officials told investors in New York.】

item.title: 曼哈顿四月公寓租金攀升至历史最高点
item.description: 曼哈顿的公寓租金上个月创下了 4 月份的新高，这一涨幅预示着即将到来的夏天将再创新高。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents rose last month to a new high for April, an increase that suggests another record-shattering summer to come.】

item.title: 没有美元的美国式借贷：欢迎来到比利时
item.description:
布鲁塞尔的政治僵局可能会在 6 月份的选举之后持续下去。【原文：

Political stasis in Brussels is likely to persist after elections in June.

】

item.title: 碧桂园首次错过担保债券最后期限
item.description: 中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co. said it cannot make an interest payment on a local bond guaranteed by a state-backed program, marking the first time that an initial deadline on such developer debt has been missed.】

item.title: 中国主要城市取消住房限购，松绑力度加大
item.description: 中国东部大城市杭州取消了所有剩余的购房限制，这是地方政府为结束房地产危机而采取积极宽松政策的最新例证。【原文：Hangzhou, a major city in eastern China, removed all of its remaining homebuying curbs, the latest example of a local government pursuing aggressive easing to end the property crisis.】

item.title: 对冲基金纷纷押注美元兑日元将升至 160 点
item.description: 对冲基金再次对日元发起攻击。【原文：Hedge funds are renewing their attack against the yen.】

item.title: 精通汽车物流公司在 IPO 中点融资 2.15 亿美元
item.description: Proficient Auto Logistics Inc. 在首次公开募股中筹集了 2.15 亿美元，股票定价为市场区间的中点。【原文：Proficient Auto Logistics Inc. raised $215 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares at the midpoint of a marketed range.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Verition 在招聘大潮中增聘花旗日元汇率交易员
item.description: Verition Fund Management LLC 聘请了花旗集团的 Shin Kobayashi 担任投资组合经理，专注于日元汇率交易。【原文：Verition Fund Management LLC has hired Citigroup Inc.’s Shin Kobayashi as a portfolio manager focused on yen rates trading, as the $9.9 billion multi-strategy hedge fund firm expands in Asia, said people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 香港交易所新任首席执行官押宝大型 IPO 回归
item.description: 香港交易及结算所有限公司（Hong Kong Exchanges & Clearing Ltd.）首席执行官表示，随着基本条件的改善和中国监管机构的帮助，该公司预计大单首次公开募股将重返香港。【原文：Hong Kong Exchanges & Clearing Ltd. is anticipating the comeback of big ticket initial public offerings to the city as underlying conditions improve and Chinese regulators give a helping hand, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Gray 认为美联储与通胀作斗争，经济增长放缓
item.description: 黑石集团（Blackstone Inc.总裁乔恩-格雷（Jon Gray）表示，由于顽固的通货膨胀影响了美联储开始降低借贷成本的能力，经济增长将放缓。【原文：Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray said economic growth will slow as stubborn inflation weighs on the Federal Reserve’s ability to begin lowering borrowing costs.】

item.title: 摩根大通纳入印度债券助力私人信贷市场
item.description: 据 BPEA Credit 称，印度被纳入摩根大通银行的债券指数将为其私人信贷市场提供投资基准并吸引更多资金流入，从而推动其私人信贷市场的发展。【原文：India’s inclusion into JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s bond index will give a boost to its private credit markets by providing a benchmark for investments and attracting more inflows, according BPEA Credit.】

item.title: 日本的储备总额可能过早反映了干预措施
item.description: 日本的外汇储备在 4 月份减少了 140 亿美元，这一下降主要反映了外国证券持有价值的下降，而不是对市场的干预。【原文：Japan’s foreign currency reserves dropped by $14 billion in April, a fall that largely reflects a drop in the value of foreign securities holdings rather than intervention in the market.】

item.title: 新加坡鹰派政策、通胀降温为债券带来顺风
item.description: 新加坡的主权债券在经历了上个月的大跌后，由于该国采取紧缩货币政策抑制通胀，吸引了大量买家。【原文：Singapore’s sovereign bonds are drawing in buyers after last month’s selloff as the nation’s tight monetary policy tames inflation.】

item.title: 黄说：新加坡必须认识到股市面临的挑战
item.description: 新加坡副总理黄遵宪表示，新加坡必须实事求是地看待影响其股票市场的全球趋势以及可以采取的应对措施。【原文：Singapore must be realistic about the global trends affecting its equities market and what can be done about them, according to Deputy Prime Minister Lawrence Wong.】

item.title: 日本实际工资下滑，但基本趋势保持稳健
item.description: 日本最新的工资数据显示，两年来每月的工资涨幅都落后于通胀率，尽管一项更深层次的趋势指标显示工资在稳步增长。【原文：Japan’s latest wage figures showed pay gains have now lagged inflation every month for two years even as a measure of the deeper trend points to steady growth.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。Arm's forecast underwhelms.习近平抵达匈牙利。消费者对电动汽车不感兴趣。美联储主席柯林斯建议保持耐心。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Arm's forecast underwhelms. Xi arrives in Hungary. Consumers sour on EVs. Fed's Collins counsels patience. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 交易商消化喜忧参半的美国库存数据，石油保持涨势
item.description: 美国的库存情况喜忧参半，其中包括全国原油库存意外下降，此后石油保持小幅上涨。【原文：Oil held a modest gain after a mixed snapshot of US inventories that included an unexpected drop in nationwide crude holdings.】

item.title: 印尼制造 "规则威胁佐科维向价值链上游迈进
item.description: 4 月中旬，外国商会的高管来到印尼一位部长的家中，呼吁取消一项新的进口规定，这表明私营部门对政府的贸易政策日益感到不安。【原文：In mid-April, executives from foreign business chambers descended upon the home of an Indonesian minister to call for the removal of a new imports rule, a sign of the private sector’s increasing consternation over the government’s trade policy.】

item.title: 美元坚挺，日元走软，股市步履维艰：市场综述
item.description: 美国股市周三收盘持平，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一。美国收益率上升支撑了美元兑日元汇率。【原文：Equities in Asia were primed for a mixed open after US stocks ended Wednesday flat. Higher US yields supported the dollar against the yen.】

item.title: 中国房地产市场举步维艰，印度、韩国和越南却炙手可热
item.description:
随着跨国公司撤离中国大陆，亚洲各城市的房租正在快速上涨。【原文：

Rents in cities across Asia are rising fast as multinationals shift away from the mainland.

】
